description: A breathtaking aerial photograph of the Colombian coffee region (Eje Cafetero) at golden hour, rolling green hills covered in coffee plantations, traditional colorful bahareque farmhouses with red tile roofs, dramatic volumetric clouds casting soft shadows, warm amber and orange tones, ultra-sharp details on every leaf and texture, shot with a Phase One XF IQ4 150MP medium format camera, f/8 aperture, photorealistic, 8K resolution, National Geographic quality
